list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add core landing page components
Introduce initial landing page sections, including: - Hero section - Architectural pillars - Architecture overview - Cost efficiency breakdown - Hidden cost crisis - Development roadmap - Final call-to-action (CTA)
Additionally, implement reusable UI components (`Card`, `Button`, `ThemeToggle`) and configure TailwindCSS. Also include supporting utilities and dependencies.
